nodes.bodyText: Rename this to form instead of from
This shouldn't have the _ prefix, because it's not an operation.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -196,7 +207,68 @@ public final Response issueApiToken(@Context final HttpServletRequest request, return Response.ok(new ResponseEntityView(map("token", token,"jwt", jwt), EMPTY_MAP)).build(); // 200 } - + /** + * Request a Token to a remote server + * @param request + * @param response + * @param formData - json data, expecting + * 
+     * {
+     *    token: {
+     *      netmask:'192.168.1.0/24',
+     *      expirationDays:1000,
+     *      userId:'dotcms.org.1'
+     *      claims: {
+     *          label: 'Push Publish'
+     *      }
+     *    },
+     * 	  remote: {
+     * 	    host: localhost,
+     * 		port: 8090
+     * 	  },
+     * 	  auth: {
+     * 	    login: admin@dotcms.com,
+     * 		pasword: [password in Base64]
+     * 	  }
+     * }
+     *
+ * @return Response + */ + @PUT + @Path("/_remote")
